biocontainers.name: trinculo
biocontainers.summary: A toolkit for carrying out genetic association for multi-category phenotypes. implements multinomial and ordinal nassociation incorporating covariates, conditional analysis,nempirical and non-emperical priors and fine-mapping.

biotools.summary: Program that implements a wide range of multinomial analyses in a single fast package that is designed to be easy to use by users of standard genome-wide association study software.

bioschemas.name: Trinculo
bioschemas.summary: Program that implements a wide range of multinomial analyses in a single fast package that is designed to be easy to use by users of standard genome-wide association study software.
